name: LoopShoot
description:
Loop Shoot is a top down shooter built in a few hours for Ludum Dare 47.  The theme is "Stuck in a Loop".    The general idea of the game is to fire missiles with your "ship" and destroy the "enemies".  

Your ship fires 3 types of missiles, Red, Green and Blue.  Destroy the enemies by hitting them with a missile that matches their color.  Beware, if you hit the enemy with the wrong color, it will duplicate!

Unfortunately, you are unable to select the color of your next missile.  The firing mechanism is STUCK IN A LOOP.  The missile sequence seems to be stuck in a loop of RED->GREEN->BLUE.

[Arrow Keys to move side to side]

[Spacebar to Shoot]
